statements: DELETE FROM lead_contacts WHERE id = 1 AND email = 'john@example.com';

DELETE FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'Email' AND activity_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM LeadInteractions WHERE lead_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
